name: Granny Beta
description:
-----------------------------------MENU--------------------------

•Click the settings button to switch Game mode to Mobile or PC

•Click the start button to start the game

•Click hats button to chooses hats.There are 20 hats in total.Move hats coming this week

------------------------------- MOBILE------------------------

•Click the 'Manage Buttons' option in MENU to place joystick and the pads according to your choice.Drag the joystick or the gamepads to change its place.

•Use gamepad to move

•Use Joystick to change direction

•Use the middle + sign in gamepad to shoot

•Click the item to pick and click the inventory slot to drop item

--------------------------------PC----------------------------------

•WSAD or Arrows key to move

•E to shoot when you have a gun loaded with bullets

•Click the item to pick it up

•Click inventory slot to to drop item in inventory
